Programming Interfaces
======================

Lettings Views
--------------

Description:
    This module handles the views for the lettings section of the application.

Endpoints:

    - ``/lettings/``: Lists all lettings.
    - ``/lettings/<int:letting_id>/``: Displays details for a specific letting.


Profiles Views
--------------

Description:
    This module handles the views for the profiles section of the application.

Endpoints:

    - ``/profiles/``: Lists all profiles.
    - ``/profiles/<str:username>/``: Displays details for a specific profile.
